item.title: Kenya police fire tear gas during school drama competition
item.description: A play critical of the government was initially disqualified from the competition under unclear circumstances.

item.title: Will iPhones cost more In US because of Trump's tariffs?
item.description: Some analysts say that if costs incurred by tariffs pass to consumers, US iPhone prices could rise by hundreds of dollars.

item.title: Woman jailed over Â£39 donation to Ukraine freed in US-Russia prisoner swap
item.description: Russian-American Ksenia Karelina was released by Moscow in return for the freeing of Russian-German Arthur Petrov.

item.title: Mike Huckabee confirmed as US ambassador to Israel
item.description: The Evangelical Christian has long been a fervent supporter of Israel.

item.title: Woman gives birth to stranger's baby in Australia embryo mix-up
item.description: The mistake at a Queensland fertility clinic has been blamed on human error.
